text: Inverclyde (; ) is one of the 32 council areas of Scotland, UK. The administrative centre is Greenock. It is at the northern end of Firth of Clyde, and borders the North Ayrshire and Renfrewshire council areas. == Towns and villages == * Gourock * Greenock * Inverkip * Kilmacolm * Port Glasgow * Quarrier's Village * Wemyss Bay Category:Inverclyde
title: Inverclyde
